header_text: You often have involuntary facial movements due to chorea. As you walk into a room of friends, you glimpse your eyebrows raising in the mirror. Your friends exchange uneasy glances as they misinterpret your facial expression as a sign of anger.

elements.text: Your face often appears less expressive than it used to. As you walk into a room of laughing friends, you glimpse your blank face in the mirror. Your friends exchange uneasy glances as they misinterpret your expression as a sign of...

elements.name: You often have involuntary facial movements due to chorea. As you walk into a room of friends, you glimpse your eyebrows raising in the mirror. Your friends exchange uneasy glances as they misinterpret your facial expression as a sign of anger._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
